DOC.criteria: Male female , > = 18 year old . There ethnic restriction . Active cancer GI tract ( gastroesophageal , colorectal , pancreaticbiliary ) complete TNM stag American Joint Committee Cancer ; stage III disease diagnose within 2 month stage IV disease Ability understand willingness sign write informed consent document .
